name: AcrisOrderStatusTranslationAppCS

infos.name: Bestellstatus Übersetzung (für Mein Konto / Bestellungen)
infos.description:
Zweck des Plugins

Im Shopware Standard ist es nicht möglich, die  Bestellstati im Bereich "Mein Konto" in anderen Sprachen als Deutsch und Englisch anzuzeigen.

Mit diesem Plugin werden Textbausteine eingefügt, welche die Übersetzungsmöglichkeit alle relevanten Bereiche wie Lieferstatus, Bestellstatus und Payment Status in andere Sprachen ermöglicht. Mitgeliefert werden die Sprachen spanisch, italienisch, französisch, niederländisch, weitere Sprachen können


Einschränkungen / Hinweise

  • Die Bestellstatus Übersetzungen werden nur in der Storefront angezeigt - genauer gesagt  (für Mein Konto / Bestellungen) angezeigt werden, im Admin Bereich werden die Bestellstati nicht übersetzt.
  • Snippet für E-Mail Templates: Die Orderstati in den E-Mails müssen bei Bedarf manuell angepasst werden:
    • Lieferstatus E-Mail Template:
      ALT:  {{ order.deliveries.first.stateMachineState.translated.name }}
      NEU:
      {% if ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.deliveries.first.stateMachineState.technicalName~'') %} {{ ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.deliveries.first.stateMachineState.technicalName~'')|trans|sw_sanitize }}{% else %}{{ order.deliveries.first.stateMachineState.translated.name }}{% endif %}
    • Zahlungsstatus:
      ALT: {{ order.transactions.first.stateMachineState.translated.name }}
      NEU:
      {% if ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.transactions.first.stateMachineState.technicalName~'') %} {{ ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.transactions.first.stateMachineState.technicalName~'')|trans|sw_sanitize }}{% else %}{{ order.transactions.first.stateMachineState.translated.name }}{% endif %}
    • Bestellstatus:
      ALT: {{ order.stateMachineState.translated.name }}
      NEU:
      {% if ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.stateMachineState.technicalName~'') %}{{ ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.stateMachineState.technicalName~'')|trans|sw_sanitize }}{% else %}{{ order.stateMachineState.translated.name }}{% endif %}
infos.installationManual: App wie in Shopware üblich installieren, danach stehen Pluignkonfigurationen / Textbausteine zur Verfügung.
infos.shortDescription: Der Bestellstatus im Bereich "Mein Konto" kann mit diesem Pluign in weitere Sprachen übersetzt werden (Lieferstatus, Bestellstatus, Payment Status) mitgeliefert werden NL, FR, IT, ES.

infos.name: Order status translation (for My Account / Orders)
infos.description:
Purpose of the App

In Shopware Standard it is not possible to display the order statuses in the "My Account" area in other languages than English and German.With this App text modules are inserted, which allows the translation possibility of all relevant areas such as delivery status, order status and payment status in other languages. Included are the languages Spanish, Italian, French, Dutch, other languages can be added.


Restrictions / Notes

  • The order status translations will be displayed only in the storefront - more precisely (for My Account / Orders) will be displayed, in the admin area the order statuses will not be translated.
  • Snippet for e-mail templates: The order statuses in the e-mails must be adjusted manually if required:
    • Delivery Status Email Template:
      OLD:  {{ order.deliveries.first.stateMachineState.translated.name }}
      NEW:
      {% if ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.deliveries.first.stateMachineState.technicalName~'') %} {{ ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.deliveries.first.stateMachineState.technicalName~'')|trans|sw_sanitize }}{% else %}{{ order.deliveries.first.stateMachineState.translated.name }}{% endif %}
    • Payment status email
      OLD: {{ order.transactions.first.stateMachineState.translated.name }}
      NEW:
      {% if ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.transactions.first.stateMachineState.technicalName~'') %} {{ ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.transactions.first.stateMachineState.technicalName~'')|trans|sw_sanitize }}{% else %}{{ order.transactions.first.stateMachineState.translated.name }}{% endif %}
    • Order status e-mail
      OLD: {{ order.stateMachineState.translated.name }}
      NEW:
      {% if ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.stateMachineState.technicalName~'') %}{{ ('acrisOrderStatusTranslation.stateMachineState.'~order.stateMachineState.technicalName~'')|trans|sw_sanitize }}{% else %}{{ order.stateMachineState.translated.name }}{% endif %}
infos.installationManual: Install app as usual in Shopware, then pluign configurations / text modules are available.
infos.shortDescription: The order status in the "My account" area can be translated into other languages with this pluign (Delivery status, Order status, Payment status) included NL, FR, IT, ES.
infos.highlights:
Order status in "My Account" section can be translated into more languages with this app:
Payment status can be translated into multiple languages
Delivery status can be translated into multiple languages
Order status can be translated into multiple languages
infos.features:
Text modules for payment status, delivery status and order status
Order status in the "My account" area can be translated into additional languages with this app
Payment status can be translated into multiple languages
Delivery status can be translated into multiple languages
Order status can be translated into multiple languages
Spanish, Italian, French and Dutch translations included
